channel.title: CVE Feed for Jeff Starr -- Simple Ajax Chat (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jeff Starr -- Simple Ajax Chat (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-27850|2024-09-17T03:28:35.258Z -- jeff%20starr -- simple%20ajax%20chat%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Simple Ajax Chat (WordPress plugin) <= 20220115 allows an attacker to clear the chat log or delete a chat message.
